ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s the same on Nameless. ... Actually it is an interesting problem, I think a warrior who wore a trench between his bind point and the action might be
ygData.messageBody:
> Heh thanks :) Its Veeshan (which explains all the Japanese
> people being
> there, heh)

It's the same on Nameless.

> A lvl one iksar would absorb one attack, heh, my lvl 8 iksar
> would do the
> same...
>
> Thanks to all who have (or will) reply, I am formulated a few
> plans in my
> head.
>
> 1. Get enough people to clear the room (obviously best option)
> 2. Get a guide to help (and I always try to be in character
> or friendly
> when i talk to them)
> 3. Log on, screech and cross my fingers.
> 3a. Get a lesser group to help my Cr from hopefully an esier spot.
> 4. Go down the shore house and wait for option 1.

Actually it is an interesting problem, I think a warrior who wore a trench
between his bind point and the action might be some small help, unless I
could get a Shaman to level 9 in time to SoW people *laughs*.


Tszaaz
